languages.text: "Возвольте взглянуть... Ох, Гален... глупец. Простите меня, Ваша Светлость, но мне нечего сказать. Я впервые вижу это письмо и не имею представления, о каком долге в нем идет речь".

traits.locale_text: "Возвольте взглянуть..." {n}Линзы окуляров Торианы судорожно следуют за строчками текста, перечитывая их снова и снова.{/n} "Ох, Гален... глупец. Простите меня, Ваша Светлость, но мне нечего сказать. Я впервые вижу это письмо и не имею представления, о каком долге в нем идет речь".
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "Let me have a look... Oh, Halen... you fool. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I have nothing to say. This is the first I have seen of this letter and I have no idea what kind of debt it might refer to."
languages.original_text: "Возвольте взглянуть... Ох, Гален... глупец. Простите меня, Ваша Светлость, но мне нечего сказать. Я впервые вижу это письмо и не имею представления, о каком долге в нем идет речь".

traits.locale_text: "Let me take a look... Oh, Halen... you fool. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I have nothing to say. This is the first time I have ever seen this letter and I have no idea what kind of debt it speaks of."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

traits.locale_text: "Let me take a look... Oh, Halen... you fool. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I have nothing to say. This is the first time I have ever seen this letter and I have no idea what kind of debt it speaks of."

traits.locale_text: "Let me have a look... Oh, Halen... you fool. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I have nothing to say. This is the first time I have ever seen this letter and I have no idea what kind of debt it invokes."

traits.locale_text: "Let me have a look... Oh, Halen... you fool. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I have nothing to say. This is the first I have seen of this letter and I have no idea what kind of debt it might refer to."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

traits.locale_text: "Let me have a look... Oh, Halen... you fool. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I have nothing to say. This is the first I have seen of this letter and I have no idea what kind of debt it might refer to."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: 「お見せください…ああ、ヘイレン…バカなことを。陛下、お許しください。何も申し上げられません。この手紙を見たのは初めてのことで、どんな借を指しているのか、見当もつきません」
languages.original_text: "Let me have a look... Oh, Halen... you fool. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I have nothing to say. This is the first I have seen of this letter and I have no idea what kind of debt it might refer to."

traits.locale_text: 「お見せください…ああ、ヘイレン…バカなことを。陛下、お許しください。何も申し上げられません。この手紙を見たのは初めてのことで、どんな借を指しているのか、見当もつきません」
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: “请给我看看……噢，哈伦……你真是个傻瓜。请您原谅，大人，但我对此无话可说。这是我第一次看到这张纸条，我不知道上面提到的债务究竟是什么意思。”
languages.original_text: "Let me have a look... Oh, Halen... you fool. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I have nothing to say. This is the first I have seen of this letter and I have no idea what kind of debt it might refer to."

traits.locale_text: “请给我看看……噢，哈伦……你真是个傻瓜。请您原谅，大人，但我对此无话可说。这是我第一次看到这张纸条，我不知道上面所说的债务究竟是什么。”
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: « Puis-je voir ? Oh, Halen... Vieil imbécile. Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie, mais je ne sais pas quoi vous dire. C'est la première fois que je vois cette lettre, et je ne sais rien d'une quelconque dette. »
languages.original_text: "Let me have a look... Oh, Halen... you fool. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I have nothing to say. This is the first I have seen of this letter and I have no idea what kind of debt it might refer to."

traits.locale_text: « Puis-je voir ? Oh, Halen... Vieil imbécile. Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie, mais je ne sais pas quoi vous dire. C'est la première fois que je vois cette lettre, et je ne sais rien d'une quelconque dette. »
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: «Déjeme echar un vistazo... Venga ya, Halen, bobo. Perdóneme, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero no tengo nada que decir. Es la primera vez que veo esta carta y no tengo ni idea de la deuda a la que se refiere».
languages.original_text: "Let me have a look... Oh, Halen... you fool. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I have nothing to say. This is the first I have seen of this letter and I have no idea what kind of debt it might refer to."

traits.locale_text: «Déjeme echar un vistazo... Venga ya, Halen, bobo. Perdóneme, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero no tengo nada que decir. Es la primera vez que veo esta carta y no tengo ni idea de la deuda a la que se refiere».
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "Lasst mich das mal sehen ... Ach, Halen ... Ihr Narr. Vergebt mir, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber ich habe nichts zu sagen. Ich sehe diesen Brief zum ersten Mal und habe keinen Schimmer, auf welche Schulden er anspielt."
languages.original_text: "Let me have a look... Oh, Halen... you fool. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I have nothing to say. This is the first I have seen of this letter and I have no idea what kind of debt it might refer to."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst mich das mal sehen ... Ach, Halen ... Ihr Narr. Vergebt mir, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber ich habe nichts zu sagen. Ich sehe diesen Brief zum ersten Mal und habe keinen Schimmer, auf welche Schulden er anspielt."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "Bir bakayım... Ah... Ahmak Halen. Affedersiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ama diyecek bir şeyim yok. Bu mektubu ilk kez görüyorum. Ne tür bir borçtan bahsettiğini de maalesef bilmiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Let me have a look... Oh, Halen... you fool. Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I have nothing to say. This is the first I have seen of this letter and I have no idea what kind of debt it might refer to."

traits.locale_text: "Bir bakayım... Ah... Ahmak Halen. Affedersiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ama diyecek bir şeyim yok. Bu mektubu ilk kez görüyorum. Ne tür bir borçtan bahsettiğini de maalesef bilmiyorum."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak
